Posts.Content: I am a male aged 64. Have had two operations for tumors, one on left breast, the second 10 months later when a tumor formed on lymph node under left armpit. About to have 3 weeks radiotherapy. Also taking Tamoxifen , apparently for 5 years. I am having some side effects from this. Any similar experiences or advice ?
Posts.Title: Male breast cancer - please share your stories
